solution_line_template: Elise has bought a total of {bought_bag1} kg + {bought_bag2} kg = <<{bought_bag1}+{bought_bag2}={total_bought}>>{total_bought}kg of dog food.
This means she already had {total_now} kg – {total_bought} kg = <<{total_now}-{total_bought}={already_had}>>{already_had}kg of dog food.
